Package dev.prozilla.pine.core.entity

Interface EntityProvider

All Superinterfaces:
EntityContext
All Known Subinterfaces:
TileProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnimationData, AudioPlayer, BorderImage, ButtonNode, CameraControlData, CameraData, Component, DynamicText, FrameNode, GridGroup, ImageNode, LayoutNode, LayoutNodeStyle, MultiTileRenderer, Node, NodeRoot, NodeStyle, NodeStyleBase, ParticleBurstEmitter, ParticleEmitter, ParticleFlowEmitter, ParticleRenderer, PhantomTile, RectRenderer, SpriteRenderer, TextInputNode, TextNode, TileRenderer, TooltipNode, Transform
@ProviderOf(Entity.class) public interface EntityProvider extends EntityContext
Interface with utility methods for finding certain entities in the current context.
